name: Puppet Theater (IDrinkJam)
description:
A game where everything runs on gold, even your health runs on gold so spend your gold wisely and dont go broke.

Abilities

Attack: Deal damage to enemy

Block: Increase dodge chance and reduce damage receive. All attack cost half the price on next turn. If dodge successfully player gain golds.

Sale: Reduce enemy damage for 3 turns.

Dice: Deal random attack at a random cost.
